title: Can anyone ID this Tesco typeface?
author: lolitayaya

comments.content:
Not sure but look a lot like [Mylius](http://web.archive.org/web/20110427064454/http:/www.monotypefonts.com/Contact/Team.asp?show=design&img=2) from Monotype.  
Mylius was a custom typeface designed for British Airways.
